name: Graviton (itch) (BMasonJ14)
description:
Uploading final build as a downloadable. Unity to WebGL keeps throwing errors and there's not a lot of references to help fix this. I learned a lot during this Game Jam most notably: 

0) Multiple Endings was a very fun task to create even with the cringe audio I made.)

0.a) Normal Ending

0.b) Almost Genocide Ending

0.c) Genocide Ending

1) I love the Black and White art style enjoyed it a lot. I didn't have to worry about making every color look perfect and I could focus on programming.

2) Static events in Unity are a pain for some reason. I couldn't unsubscribe from some events leading to some really weird bugs. I think I got most of them. It was really really a pain. Maybe I need to refresh myself of events lol.

Graviton by BMasonJ14:

Art by BMasonJ14

Programming by BMasonJ14

Sound by BMasonJ14 and Roommate Will. (Sorry the dialog was cringe)

Level Design by BMasonJ14

Please leave some comments on how the game could be better!
